Docs.summary: Create a schema definition by enumerating all public fields of the given type.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.Data.SchemaDefinition.Column this[string columnName] { get; set; }
Default Public Property Item(columnName As String) As SchemaDefinition.Column
member this.Item(string) : Microsoft.ML.Data.SchemaDefinition.Column with get, set

Docs.summary: Get or set the column definition by column name. If there's no such column: - get returns null, - set adds a new column. If there's more than one column with the same name: - get returns the first column, - set replaces the first column.
